mean_en: a strong border or structure of wood, metal, etc. that holds a picture, door, piece of glass, etc. in position; the supporting structure of a piece of furniture, a building, a vehicle, etc. that gives it its shape; a structure of plastic or metal that holds the lenses in a pair of glasses; the form or structure of a person or animal’s body
sentence: The picture looks nice in this wooden frame.
sentence_trans: 这幅画在这个木质的画框里看起来很漂亮。
